key: Blue Shirt Guy
original: Blue Shirt Guy
translation: 蓝衣服家伙

key: Yo! What's up?
original: Yo! What's up?
translation: 嘿，怎么了？

key: Me
original: Me
translation: 我

key: It's locked.
original: It's locked.
translation: 它锁上了

key: Black Hoodie Guy
original: Black Hoodie Guy
translation: 蓝夹克家伙

key: You should do some pushup dude! You look like a peipar to me.
original: You should do some pushup dude! You look like a peipar to me.
translation: 你真得做点俯卧撑了！你看着像个纸片人

key: Do you know anything yet?
original: Do you know anything yet?
translation: 你知道什么吗？

key: There was a group of people reported as missing and miraculously appeared outside the forest without any problem.
original: There was a group of people reported as missing and miraculously appeared outside the forest without any problem.
translation: 以前有人在那里失踪后有莫名其妙完好无损的在森林外出现了

key: Are they okay?
original: Are they okay?
translation: 他们没事吧？

key: They are fine as always. Just exhausted and passed out.
original: They are fine as always. Just exhausted and passed out.
translation: 他们一切照常，就是单纯累坏了

key: Fine as always?
original: Fine as always?
translation: 一切照常？

key: What are you guys talking about? Looks like this happened not just only once.
original: What are you guys talking about? Looks like this happened not just only once.
translation: 你们在说什么？听上去挺有趣的

key: Oh, new face!
original: Oh, new face!
translation: 哦新来的！

key: I have never seen you before.
original: I have never seen you before.
translation: 我还没和你打招呼呢

key: I am a new transfer student. I just moved here not too long ago. My name is \n[1].
original: I am a new transfer student. I just moved here not too long ago. My name is \n[1].
translation: 我是新来的转校生，不就前才搬过来，我叫\n[1]

key: We're talking about a group of people who went missing in the woods.
original: We're talking about a group of people who went missing in the woods.
translation: 我们在聊在森林里失踪的家伙

key: This is so common and they named it the Lost Woods.
original: This is so common and they named it the Lost Woods.
translation: 因为经常出现这样的事，所以人们都叫那儿迷失森林

key: There were some people who went on it as an adventure and the common point was that they went missing and passed out outside the forest the next day.
original: There were some people who went on it as an adventure and the common point was that they went missing and passed out outside the forest the next day.
translation: 有人不信邪去冒险，最后结果大都是失踪在那里然后过几天又出现在森林外，筋疲力竭

key: It's so scary. Is it a haunted forest?
original: It's so scary. Is it a haunted forest?
translation: 听着挺吓人，那里闹鬼吗？

key: Ha-ha. Don't worry?
original: Ha-ha. Don't worry?
translation: 哈哈，别担心

key: They were all fine and only lost some memory before entering the forest.
original: They were all fine and only lost some memory before entering the forest.
translation: 他们都没什么大事，只是忘掉了进森林里后的一些事罢了

key: I guess it was an unpleasant feeling. Haha.
original: I guess it was an unpleasant feeling. Haha.
translation: 我猜忘掉的大概不是什么好事吧，哈哈

key: Just imagine you want to do something and suddenly you forget it. After a while, you think about it but have no way of remembering what you wanted to do.
original: Just imagine you want to do something and suddenly you forget it. After a while, you think about it but have no way of remembering what you wanted to do.
translation: 就像是你想做什么事，结果突然想不起来了

key: Yeah, It happened to me a number of times when I walked through a doorway. Some say it's the doorway effect.
original: Yeah, It happened to me a number of times when I walked through a doorway. Some say it's the doorway effect.
translation: 嗯，我日常生活中就经常出现这种情况，好像叫什么“门洞效应”

key: It made me really curious. I should go there and see it for a bit.
original: It made me really curious. I should go there and see it for a bit.
translation: 越说越好奇了，我得去看看都有些什么

key: It looks harmless anyway, the worst part is just getting too tired and losing a bit of memory.
original: It looks harmless anyway, the worst part is just getting too tired and losing a bit of memory.
translation: 听他们说也不会出什么大事，最糟的情况不过就是累坏了外加忘掉些事儿罢了

key: Do you know where it is? I mean the Lost Woods.
original: Do you know where it is? I mean the Lost Woods.
translation: 你知道迷失森林在哪吗？

key: Do you also want to go there and check it out?
original: Do you also want to go there and check it out?
translation: 你也想去看看是吧？

key: Yeah, it looks fun. Don't you think?
original: Yeah, it looks fun. Don't you think?
translation: 嗯，我觉得挺有趣的

key: Ha-ha. I bet he will last one minute.
original: Ha-ha. I bet he will last one minute.
translation: 哈哈，我猜他最多坚持一分钟

key: Come on, dude! At least one minute and one second.
original: Come on, dude! At least one minute and one second.
translation: 别这么说！我猜至少一分钟零一秒

key: Ha-ha.
original: Ha-ha.
translation: 哈哈！

key: Ha-ha!
original: Ha-ha!
translation: 哈哈

key: Hey! You still haven't answered my question and I think you are leading this conversation in a different direction.
original: Hey! You still haven't answered my question and I think you are leading this conversation in a different direction.
translation: 嘿！倒是回答我的问题啊

key: Ha-ha, sorry! Do you know where is the forest?
original: Ha-ha, sorry! Do you know where is the forest?
translation: 哈哈，抱歉，你知道森林在哪吗？

key: If I remember correctly, there is a forest to the left side of \C[20]Auntie Daisy\C[0]'s house.
original: If I remember correctly, there is a forest to the left side of \C[20]Auntie Daisy\C[0]'s house.
translation: 如果我没记错，\C[20]黛西阿姨\C[0]房子左侧就有一片森林

key: I think I know it. There is a forest to the left of where I live.
original: I think I know it. There is a forest to the left of where I live.
translation: 我知道，我家附近就有一片森林

key: Yes, that is the one. There is only one forest in this town.
original: Yes, that is the one. There is only one forest in this town.
translation: 嗯，就是那座。这镇子上只有那一座森林

key: When you have arrived in the forest, just keep going to the left and you will get to the Lost Woods Passageway.
original: When you have arrived in the forest, just keep going to the left and you will get to the Lost Woods Passageway.
translation: 你到森林里再往前走就到迷失森林小道了

key: When you have arrived there, the Lost Woods is up ahead.
original: When you have arrived there, the Lost Woods is up ahead.
translation: 再往里走就是迷失森林

key: Oh, thanks!
original: Oh, thanks!
translation: 嗯，谢了！

key: Just let us know if you can last longer than a minute a second.
original: Just let us know if you can last longer than a minute a second.
translation: 坚持不住也不用怕别人笑话啊！

key: I know it's not dangerous but it's better to go there in the morning.
original: I know it's not dangerous but it's better to go there in the morning.
translation: 虽然没那么危险，但我最好还是早上去吧

key: \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0]
original: \C[25]Ms. Megan\C[0]
translation: \C[25]梅根小姐\C[0]

key: Ha-ha. What are two love birds doing here?
original: Ha-ha. What are two love birds doing here?
translation: 哈哈，这对小情侣在这儿干嘛呢？

key: Retry
original: Retry
translation: 重试

key: Stop right there!!!
original: Stop right there!!!
translation: 赶快停下！！

key: \c[1]***You were arrested and spent ten years in jail***\c[0]
original: \c[1]***You were arrested and spent ten years in jail***\c[0]

key: Hi, \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0].
original: Hi, \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0].
translation: Hi, \C[14]埃米小姐\C[0].

key: \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0]
original: \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0]
translation: \C[14]埃米小姐\C[0]

key: Good moring, \n[1].
original: Good moring, \n[1].
translation: 早上好，\n[1]

key: Are you keeping up with the curriculum? Also don't worry, if you don't understand something I can tutor you after the morning class.
original: Are you keeping up with the curriculum? Also don't worry, if you don't understand something I can tutor you after the morning class.
translation: 你还在为学习发愁吗？如果你哪里不懂的话，我可以上完课后教你

key: Ha-ha. I'm fine.
original: Ha-ha. I'm fine.
translation: 哈哈，我没事

key: But I really hope you can tutor me after class.
original: But I really hope you can tutor me after class.
translation: 但我确实希望你能下课教我

key: That's great!
original: That's great!
translation: 那就行！

key: Anyway, I forgot to tell you something. After class, you need to visit the principal to sign your attendance for the first time.
original: Anyway, I forgot to tell you something. After class, you need to visit the principal to sign your attendance for the first time.
translation: 还有我忘了说，下课后你得先去校长室在考勤表上签字

key: Okay! Thanks, \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0].
original: Okay! Thanks, \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0].
translation: 好，谢谢你，\C[14]埃米小姐\C[0].

key: But where is he? I'm still new in here.
original: But where is he? I'm still new in here.
translation: 但校长室在哪呢？我完全不知道

key: You can find her office in the left corridor of the third floor.
original: You can find her office in the left corridor of the third floor.
translation: 在三楼左边走廊

key: Okay, I have to go. See you in class.
original: Okay, I have to go. See you in class.
translation: 嗯，我得走了，到时候在班里等你

key: See you later,  \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0].
original: See you later,  \C[14]Ms. Emmi\C[0].
translation: 到时候见，\C[14]埃米小姐\C[0].

key: The Principal... I wonder what he looks like.
original: The Principal... I wonder what he looks like.
translation: 校长……是个什么样的人呢？

key: He-he. Must be a man with a beer belly.
original: He-he. Must be a man with a beer belly.
translation: 嘿嘿，一定是个大肚子秃头吧

key: I should get there after \c[20]3 PM\c[0].
original: I should get there after \c[20]3 PM\c[0].
translation: 我得\c[20]3 PM\c[0]后去校长室
